mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MUST_EAT_PLACE(id, place, restaurant_name, review, asterion, telephone_number, representative_menu) VALUES(NVL((SELECT MAX(id) + 1 FROM MUST_EAT_PLACE),1), #{place}, #{restaurant_name}, #{review}, #{asterion}, #{telephone_number}, #{representative_menu})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT mep.id, mep.place, mep.restaurant_name, mep.review, mep.telephone_number, mep.representative_menu, mep.asterion FROM MUST_EAT_PLACE mep INNER JOIN menu_info mi ON mep.id = mi.menu_id order by mep.id
mapper.update: UPDATE MUST_EAT_PLACE SET place = #{place}, restaurant_name = #{restaurant_name}, review = #{review}, asterion = #{asterion}, representative_menu = #{representative_menu}, telephone_number = #{telephone_number} WHERE id = #{id}
